pageProduct.name: Swisse Skincare Rose Hip Antioxidant Facial Oil 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This skin nutrient-rich ingredient is scientifically proven to be a rich source of skin-friendly omega 3 and 6 fatty acids, to improve skin hydration. Rose Hip Oil also contains a rich source of antioxidants, which helps prevent the signs of aging.

Swisse Rose Hip Antioxidant Facial Oil is a lightweight, non-greasy formula that's enriched with a nourishing blend of Rose Hip and essential oils, it improves skin hydration, protect the skin's moisture barrier and provides a rich source of antioxidants for healthy and rosy skin.

Suitable For: normal to dry skin

Size: 50mL

Warnings

Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

ROSE HIP Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Fruit Oil
ROSE HIP Certified Organic Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Fruit Oil
Tocopherol (Vitamin E delivered from Soy and Sunflower)
GRAPEFRUIT Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil
ORANGE Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil
MAY CHANG Litsea Cubeba Fruit (May Chang) Oil
Cymbopogon Martini (Palma Rosa) Oil
ROSE GERANIUM Pelargonium Graveolens Flower (Rose Geranium) Oil
Fragrance

Directions

Gently massage 2-3 drops into clean, dry skin until absorbed. Use as required on face, hair or body. Suitable for normal skin, it can also be used for dry and oily skin types. This product contains essential oils

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store upright below 28°C.
